tool_description:
Get Free SMS API for Your website, and Any application. currently we have daily limit on free API, we are offering 20 SMS/day. If you need more SMs, contact us.  http://www.hajanaone.com/contact-us.php

Only registered members can get his Service. if you are not registered at our website you need to be registered first. Register Here and get free account fron this link. http://www.hajanaone.com/signup.php

If you are already registered you can login here http://www.hajanaone.com/login.php
